message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn to be fair, inflation is eating our money!
Inflation hurts me, not you. I'll take a bit more.
This is getting ridiculous, take a decent offer before it's too late for both of us!
I'll take the risk, you're not being generous enough.
Alice, inflation is killing you. Take this offer, it's the best you'll get!
